means: 诱奸( seduce的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The promise of huge profits seduced him into parting with his money.
sentence.Network_cn: 高额利润的许诺诱使他把钱出了手。

sentence.Network_en: His doctrines have seduced many into error.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的学说把许多人诱入歧途.

sentence.Network_en: He seduced her into an affair that had tragic consequences for both of them.
sentence.Network_cn: 他诱奸了她,这件事对双方都产生了悲剧性的后果.

PerfectNetExp.abs: he was seduced to betray his friend ., 他受唆使而出卖朋友.

list.abs: 42. believe the worst in sb 把某人想得很怀43. seduce sb 引诱某人44. testimony 证言（这里指教会活动中的个人演讲，讲述自己对圣经的亲身体验）.
Craig Bellamy - Tries to seduce snake . Fails . Kills snake with putter ., 贝拉米 ― ― 试图引诱蛇 . 尝试失败后 , 用高尔夫球棒杀死了蛇.

...era的性感奇观（212 Sexy）的告白语就是“被引诱……”(be seduced)； h Cole的BlaCK告白则是一对俊男美男神采暧昧，配上Mont B…

entry.def: If something seduces you, it is so attractive that it makes you do something that you would not otherwise do.

example.ex: The view of lake and plunging cliffs seduces visitors...
example.tran: 湖光旖旎、峭壁峥嵘，游客们被深深吸引了。

example.ex: Clever advertising would seduce more people into smoking.
example.tran: 巧妙策划的广告会引诱更多的人吸烟。

entry.def: If someone seduces another person, they use their charm to persuade that person to have sex with them.

example.ex: She has set out to seduce Stephen.
example.tran: 她已经开始勾引斯蒂芬了。

auth_sentence.content: But Polidori's Byronic ghoul only seduced and killed.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Polidori's Byronic ghoul only seduced and killed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Polidori's Byronic ghoul only seduced and killed.

auth_sentence.content: Larry David pushed audiences away; Jerry Seinfeld seduced them.
auth_sentence.res_content: Larry David pushed audiences away; Jerry Seinfeld seduced them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Larry David pushed audiences away; Jerry Seinfeld seduced them.

auth_sentence.content: Passions by which the heady and vehement are seduced and betrayed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Passions by which the heady and vehement are seduced and betrayed.
